custom-sql.sql: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM AssetEntries_AssetCategories WHERE (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) AND (AssetEntries_AssetCategories.categoryId IN ([$CATEGORY_ID$])) )
SELECT DISTINCT AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId FROM AssetEntries_AssetTags WHERE ([$TAG_ID$])
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Subur_ItemItemType WHERE (Subur_ItemItemType.itemId = AssetEntry.classPK) AND (Subur_ItemItemType.itemTypeId IN ([$ITEMTYPE_ID$])) )
SELECT a.*,b.itemid from Subur_ItemType a INNER JOIN Subur_ItemItemType b ON a.itemtypeid = b.itemtypeid AND b.itemid = ?

SELECT * FROM Subur_Item LEFT JOIN Subur_ItemAuthor ON Subur_ItemAuthor.itemId = Subur_Item.itemId WHERE Subur_ItemAuthor.authorId = ? AND Subur_Item.groupId = ? AND Subur_Item.status = ? ORDER BY Subur_Item.publishedDate DESC
select * from Subur_ItemItemType a, Subur_ItemType b where a.itemId = ? and a.itemTypeId = b.itemTypeId
select * from Subur_ItemAuthor , Subur_Author where Subur_ItemAuthor.authorid = Subur_Author.authorid and Subur_ItemAuthor.itemid = ?
SELECT * FROM Subur_Author WHERE [$WHERE$] (lower(Subur_Author.firstName) LIKE ? ) ORDER BY Subur_Author.firstName ASC
SELECT * FROM Subur_Author WHERE (lower (Subur_Author.firstName) LIKE ?) OR (lower(Subur_Author.lastName) LIKE ?) AND companyId = ? AND groupId = ? ORDER BY Subur_Author.firstName ASC
SELECT * FROM Subur_Author WHERE (lower (Subur_Author.firstName) LIKE ?) AND (lower(Subur_Author.lastName) LIKE ?) AND companyId = ? AND groupId = ? ORDER BY Subur_Author.firstName ASC
SELECT count(*) as total FROM Subur_Author WHERE (lower (Subur_Author.firstName) LIKE ?) AND (lower(Subur_Author.lastName) LIKE ?) AND companyId = ? AND groupId = ?
SELECT count(*) as total FROM Subur_Author WHERE (lower (Subur_Author.firstName) LIKE ?) OR (lower(Subur_Author.lastName) LIKE ?) AND companyId = ? AND groupId = ?

SELECT Subur_ItemAuthor.authorid, Count(*) AS itemTotal FROM Subur_ItemAuthor INNER JOIN Subur_Author ON Subur_Author.authorid = Subur_ItemAuthor.authorid WHERE Subur_Author.companyid = ? AND Subur_Author.groupid = ? GROUP BY Subur_ItemAuthor.authorid

SELECT * FROM Subur_Author
WHERE companyId = ? AND groupId = ? AND lastPublishedDate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lastPublishedDate DESC

SELECT * FROM Subur_Expertise
WHERE [$GROUP_ID$] Subur_Expertise.indexedName LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL ORDER BY Subur_Expertise.indexedName ASC

SELECT * FROM Subur_ResearchInterest
WHERE [$GROUP_ID$] Subur_ResearchInterest.indexedName LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL ORDER BY Subur_ResearchInterest.indexedName ASC
SELECT permonth,count(*) as totalview FROM Subur_ViewSummary WHERE perYear=? GROUP BY perMonth ORDER BY perMonth ASC

SELECT perMonth as permonth,assetTag.name as tagname,count(*) as totalview FROM Subur_StatViewTag LEFT JOIN AssetTag ON AssetTag.tagId = Subur_StatViewTag.tagId WHERE perYear=? GROUP BY perMonth,AssetTag.name ORDER BY AssetTag.name ASC

SELECT itemTypeName as itemtypename,perMonth as permonth,count(*) as totalview FROM Subur_StatViewItemtype LEFT JOIN Subur_ItemType ON Subur_StatViewItemtype.itemTypeId = Subur_ItemType.itemTypeId WHERE perYear = ? GROUP BY perMonth,itemTypeName ORDER BY itemTypeName ASC

SELECT permonth,name as categoryname,count(*) as totalview FROM Subur_StatViewCategory LEFT JOIN AssetCategory ON Subur_StatViewCategory.categoryId = AssetCategory.categoryId WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from AssetVocabulary WHERE vocabularyId = AssetCategory.vocabularyId AND vocabularyId = [$VOCAB_ID$] ) AND perYear = [$YEAR$] GROUP BY perMonth,name ORDER BY name
